name: Gentrifry
description:
The Gentrifiers are in your town to enrich your hood. Time for some countermeasures!

Place your local heroes (e.g. filthy dogs) on the streets to banish hipsters, e-car freaks and career parents who already float through the city, turning the buildings to gold. Your rage is the currency in this game, you can "buy" new units with it.

You lose if 50% of the city is gentrified, and you win if you keep it below 50% for a given number of rounds.

  • 3 levels
  • 3 enemy types, 3 hero types
  • Zoom in/out with arrow keys up/down
  • Hero Select in the lower right corner (in case it's not obvious)
